gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 126, Trail Blazers 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Luka Doncic tallied his seventh 40-point game of the season (leads the league) with 41 points, six rebounds, and five assists as the Mavericks defeated the Blazers, 126-97. Kyrie Irving totaled 29 points, nine rebounds, and five assists as Tim Hardaway Jr. added 14 points. Shaedon Sharpe led Portland with 16 points and four rebounds as Anfernee Simons had 15 points and five rebounds. Dallas improves to 20-15 as Portland moves to 9-24.
